item.title: [Python] Let's execute a module periodically using schedule
item.description: Introduces the schedule module which is useful for making the module run periodically. schedule is a useful module when you want to perform the same task at regular intervals (every few minutes, hours, or days). It is a convenient module for situations such as collecting information by web scraping. After summarizing the usage of the basic schedule module, I will introduce a module that executes scraping regularly as an implementation example.
